title: 2013 Terengganu FA season
text:
The Football Association of Terengganu (<a href="Bahasa%20Melayu">Bahasa Melayu</a>: Persatuan Bola Sepak Negeri Terengganu (PBSNT) enters a team in Malaysian <a href="association%20football">football</a> competitions to represent the state of <a href="Terengganu">Terengganu</a>. The team is based in <a href="Kuala%20Terengganu">Kuala Terengganu</a>, <a href="Terengganu">Terengganu</a>, Malaysia. They play in the top division in Malaysian football, the <a href="Malaysian%20Super%20League">Malaysian Super League</a>. Their home stadium is the <a href="Sultan%20Ismail%20Nasiruddin%20Shah%20Stadium">Sultan Ismail Nasiruddin Shah Stadium</a>, Kuala Terengganu.
The 2013 season was Terengganu's 3rd season in the <a href="Malaysia%20Super%20League">Malaysia Super League</a>, and their 18th consecutive season in the top-flight of Malaysian football. In addition, they were competing in the domestic tournaments, the <a href="2013%20Malaysia%20FA%20Cup">2013 Malaysia FA Cup</a> and the <a href="2013%20Malaysia%20Cup">2013 Malaysia Cup</a>
Terengganu will announce their sponsors for the 2013 season as well as presenting the new kits on 3 January 2013.

Players.
Terengganu FA squad 2013.
Transfers.
All start dates are pending confirmation.
Super League.
The fixtures for the <a href="2013%20Malaysia%20Super%20League">2013 season</a> were announced on 8 January 2013. The league is set to start on 8 January 2013.
Matches.
 <br>
Kickoff times are in +08:00 GMT.
FA Cup.
<a href="Terengganu%20FA">Terengganu</a> will begin their FA Cup campaign in the first round, vs <a href="Suruhanjaya%20Perkhidmatan%20Awam%20FC">Putrajaya SPA FC</a>. The draw for the FA Cup's first and subsequent rounds was held on 10 December 2012 at Grand BlueWave Hotel, <a href="Shah%20Alam">Shah Alam</a>, <a href="Selangor">Selangor</a>.
